name: Hamster Simulator (Ruthie Edwards)
description:
Description

With Ruthie Edwards's Hamster Simulator™, now you can realistically simulate all the many exciting things a hamster does.

Controls

Mouse only. Click on the water bottle, hay, and wheel to interact. Hold your mouse button on the wheel to make the hamster run!

Tools Used

Engine: Unity
Art: Aseprite
Audio: GarageBand

Made in 1 day for Ludum Dare 47 - October 4, 2020 - because I wanted to go hiking but also make a game.
